import React,{useState} from 'react'; import {Card,ToggleButton,ToggleButtonGroup,Form,Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; const Idea = ({datos}) => { const [value, setValue] = useState([1, 3]); const handleChange = (val) => setValue(val); return ( <> {datos.idea} {datos.description}
Author: {datos.author.name}

Puntos: 10

Positivo Negativo
Email address We'll never share your email with anyone else. Password
) } export default Idea
